resources.string: Aaron Wan-BissakaArticle Talk Read Edit View history Tools From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia Aaron Wan-Bissaka Aaron Wan Bissaka 2019.jpg Wan-Bissaka playing for Manchester United in 2019 Personal information Full name Aaron Wan-Bissaka[1] Date of birth 26 November 1997 (age 25)[2] Place of birth Croydon, England Height 6 ft 0 in (1.83 m)[3] Position(s) Right-back Team information Current team Manchester United Number 29 Youth career Junior Elite 2009–2016 Crystal Palace Senior career* Years Team Apps (Gls) 2016–2019 Crystal Palace 42 (0) 2019– Manchester United 102 (2) International career 2015 DR Congo U20 1 (0) 2018 England U20 2 (0) 2018–2019 England U21 3 (0) *Club domestic league appearances and goals, correct as of 20:14, 16 April 2023 (UTC) Aaron Wan-Bissaka (born 26 November 1997) is an English professional footballer who plays as a right-back for Premier League club Manchester United.
